article_title: Two Officers of Elite Police Unit Charged With Murder in Bangladesh
article_text:
DHAKA, Bangladesh—Prosecutors in Bangladesh have charged two senior officers of an elite police unit for the execution-style killings of seven people in an unprecedented move against members of the country's powerful law enforcement agencies.

The two officers of the Rapid Action Battalion—a paramilitary crime-fighting unit whose members are drawn from the armed forces and the police—were sacked from the force and taken into custody...
